People can change so just try and forgive and forget as hard as it is.  I hope it goes well for you angel .donspink

Posts.Content: Jul 8, 2008 08:01AM donspink wrote: Stephanie don't worry darling your in God's loving hands, just trust in him and you will be fine, he has a plan for you.  Ask him to surround you in his loving arms and you will feel much better, ask him to take away the pain and know child that you will be where you are supposed to be at just exactly the right time, it is the Divine Plan. Angels please surround Stephanie with your infinite love, set her free of her pain heal her, & keep her safe. Amen. God bless you. I have lit a candle for you. donspink
